name: Rabbit Hole (itch) (AkiraAkechi)
description:
Team name - Midnight Snack

WASD - movement, Space - jump/climbing; CTRL - crouch, E - pick up item;

RMB - use Lantern, LMB - throw firefly,

TAB - up/down to ceiling,

List any content that was created before the jam:

Climbing animation and locomotion, sound by weloveindies.com Everything else we do ourselves.

https://youtu.be/cxU8BYrWYh4 gameplay video

 using only a single, 4 channel texture map
